abilities.name: Spiritual Leader
abilities.rule: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly **ADEPTUS ASTARTES** unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: Litany of Hate
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.
